entry.source: 〉 The area is densely covered with thick{F801}trees...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The area is densely covered with thick{F801}trees...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Samurai healer treated your{F801}wounds...{F801}{F802}〉 {F843,0} and the others were{F801}healed.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Samurai healer treated your{F801}wounds...{F801}{F802}〉 {F843,0} and the others were{F801}healed.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hope\0{F87A,8}If you are injured, better to return{F801}here than to risk going further. The{F801}healers can treat your wounds.{F801}{F802}Well then, I must ask that you resume{F801}the mission.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Samurai on guard\0{F87A,29}{F813,1,403042}I will risk my life guarding this place{F801}to prevent any villagers who escaped{F801}into the forest from going deeper in.{F801}{F802}You should turn back and work toward{F801}turning up any survivors.{F801}
